channel.title: People on SCPFAA Handbook
channel.description: Recent content in People on SCPFAA Handbook

item.title: Guidelines
item.description: Keep in mind that anything you do is or could be made public, for example voice/ video recording, chat messages, profile pictures, name/ nickname, etc. You may want to create seprarate account(s) to interact with the SCPFAA podcast/ members.
